message: Hey Bob, I have a great product for you today! It's priced at $100, and I think you'll be very happy with it.  What do you say?
Thanks for the recommendation, Alice. But I'd like to see more products before I make a decision. Can you show me a few more?

Hey Bob, I understand you want to see more options. This one is a bit different from the last, but I'm confident you'll be interested. It's priced at $100, just like the previous one. Let me know what you think!

Thanks Alice, but I'm still hesitant. I'm not sure if I'm comfortable with the price yet, especially since I haven't seen any high-quality products. Can you tell me more about your products and what makes them special?

Hey Bob, I understand your hesitation.  This product is very similar to the ones I've shown you before, but I believe it's a good value at $100.  I want you to be happy with your purchase, so if you're still unsure, I'm happy to continue showing you more options.  Just let me know what you think!
